course: LEGO® SPIKE™ essential beginner with kit

learn.title: TEAM based learning
learn.desc: LEGO®️ Education provides hands-on Science, Technology,Engineering, Arts and Mathematics solutions with lessons that are adaptable to students across all ages and abilities.

learn.title: BLOCK/SCRATCH programming
learn.desc: Learn how to write BLOCK based and TEXT based programs using LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential drag and drop software which provides an intuitive and easy-to-use programming environment.

learn.title: Work with Lego bricks and sensors
learn.desc: Kit includes 454 LEGO bricks, wireless sensors and motors which offers endless possibilities, promoting computational thinking, and engineering principles in a fun and engaging way.

learn.title: Creative thinking
learn.desc: Hands on learning experience that promotes children’s creative thinking, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.Research from the LEGO® Foundation found that learning through play builds confidence through the development of holistic skills.

list.list: Intro. Of Kit & Software, Construction Of First Model

benefits.benefits: Apply engineering design skills at each step of the design process.
Develop efficient problem-solving and coding skills
Design projects that combine hardware and software components to collect and exchange data.
Work with variables, data arrays and cloud data.
Apply critical thinking and develop life skills for the careers of tomorrow.

certification: Certificate will be awarded after successful completion of each level. Student can opt for advance level once they finish their basic level course.
